name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Page Analytics: on-page SEO insights from GA4

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Google Analytics (GA4) and Google Search analytics for the current page. Works for online stores, blogs, news sites, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Page Analytics is a fantastic SEO tool that offers valuable insights for the current webpage directly from Google Analytics and Google Search Console. It serves as the uplifting successor to Google's discontinued "Page Analytics" extension.

This extension is ideal for content creators, SEO specialists, marketers, and web developers. It works seamlessly for any website, including WordPress, Shopify, Squarespace, Wix, and more.

With Page Analytics, you can:

- Visualize user engagement through a click heatmap, revealing the next destinations of your site's visitors.

- Dive into comprehensive graphs that detail pageviews, user interactions, session lengths, bounce percentages, and conversion metrics.

- Gain valuable insights into how people discover your site, the search terms they use on Google, and the external links they click on.

To use this extension, you will need a Google Analytics account and ownership of the property you wish to track. You can create a Google Analytics account at https://analytics.google.com.

Do you have any questions or feedback? Please don't hesitate to contact us at support@pageanalytics.info.
